blip_gpt_prompts.joker: Create a joke like a meme about the image, it shows: {image_caption}. Try to be brief and post-ironic. Try to avoid starting with 'when you'. Используй русский язык.
blip_gpt_prompts.basic: Imagine that I sent you a picture, it shows: {image_caption}. Используй русский язык.
